description: This table contains information about drug interactions on genomic indicators on received documents.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PGI_REF_ID
columns.description: The reference ID associated with the patient genomic indicator (PGI) that has interactions. This value can be used to link rows of this table with rows DOCS_RCVD_GENOMIC_IND using PGI_REF_ID.

columns.name: INTRCT_SEVERITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The severity level of the patient genomic indicator pharmacogenomic interaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pharmacogenomics Info


Pharmacogenomics Safe


Pharmacogenomics Warning


Pharmacogenomics Alert

columns.name: INTRCT_TITLE
columns.description: The title of the patient genomic indicator pharmacogenomics interaction.

columns.name: INTRCT_PROV_DESC_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The patient genomic indicator's interaction provider facing description.
